text: Watee geubaca dum ayat Kamoe Ubak jih dumnyoe ngon trang geupeugah Awak han pateh mreumpok ngon Kamoe i Jikheun le meunoe jipeugot ulah Qurâ€˜an laen taba leh keunoe Got pih tagantoe laen tapeugah Takheun di lon han jeut roh lon gantoe Meunyo lon keudroe raya that salah Di lon lon ikot peue nyang geuwahi Hana beurani lon pubuet salah Meu han lon ikot nyang yue Hadharat Azeub raya that keu lon Neubalah Azeub bak uroe that haro-hara
